tool_description: Measures sebum production levels across different facial zones and provides oil control recommendations.

forehead_shine.description: Forehead shine level 2 hours after cleansing (1-5 scale)

nose_shine.description: Nose shine level 2 hours after cleansing (1-5 scale)

chin_shine.description: Chin shine level 2 hours after cleansing (1-5 scale)

error_messages: Invalid shine level: All shine parameters must be integers between 1-5.
Incomplete assessment: All three facial zones (forehead, nose, chin) must be evaluated.
usage: Assess shine levels in T-zone areas 2 hours after cleansing without applying any products. Use scale where 1=no shine, 5=very shiny.

oil_distribution.description: Pattern of oil distribution across face
